question: Question_07_(c)
statement:
The probability that a newly divided cell will divide again
\textbf{before} \emph{t} hours (where \emph{t} $\geq$ 0) is given by

\begin{align*}F(t) = 1-e^{-t/12}\end{align*}

(c) What is the median division time?
hints:
There is a direct relation between the median and the cumulative
function.
